articles.author: Bring Me The Sports
articles.title: Correa ignites Twins in Detroit for 5th straight win - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Twins led 7-0 after two innings and never looked back.
articles.content:
Carlos Correa hit an RBI double in the first inning and then smoked a three-run homer in the second inning to fuel the Twins to a 9-3 win over the Tigers in Detroit Monday night.
